channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Andy Carroll to appear in court after arrest and charge for breaching order
item.description: Carroll charged with breaching non-molestation order Former England striker due in court on Tuesday The former England striker Andy Carroll has been c...

item.title: Ukraine war live: Zelenskyy lands in Florida ​for Trump peace​ talks; call with European leaders to take place after meeting
item.description: Ukrainian president will meet US president at his Mar-a-Lago home later today for their first in person meeting since October The Ukrainian military s...

item.title: Tyler Perry faces second sexual assault lawsuit for $77m
item.description: Latest suit claims the billionaire film-maker subjected actor Mario Rodriguez to repeated unwanted sexual advances Tyler Perry has been hit with a $77...

item.title: Off-the-shoulder tops and a signature hair-do: Brigitte Bardot’s style legacy
item.description: Model turned actor never lost the poise from her dancing days – but she also made gingham and leopard print her own French screen legend dies aged 91 ...

item.title: Texas father rescues kidnapped 15-year-old daughter after tracking her phone’s location
item.description: Authorities say they arrested a man, 23, for kidnapping teen in a Houston suburb as she walked her dog on Christmas A Texas father used the parental c...

item.title: French cinema actress Brigitte Bardot dies aged 91
item.description: The actress was a symbol of sexual liberation in the 1950s but became increasingly controversial after making homophobic and racist slurs.

item.title: Three killed in Sweden as major storm sweeps across Nordic countries
item.description: Thousands of homes in parts of Finland, Sweden and Norway have been left without power.

item.title: 'Devoted' dad dies after assault outside pub
item.description: Police launched a murder inquiry after David Darke, 66, died in hospital days after an assault.

item.title: Egyptian dissident should be deported from UK, Tories say
item.description: Alaa Abdel Fattah flew to the UK on Friday after a travel ban imposed by Cairo was lifted.

item.title: Ex-England batter and ECB boss Morris dies
item.description: Hugh Morris, the former England and Glamorgan batter and England and Wales Cricket Board chief executive, has died at the age of 62.
